work.summary: Moonshot is a tech-driven private equity firm specialized in e-commerce. I built the platform that collect, analyze and visualize alternative data to assist the M & A due diligence process, providing insightful analysis and recommendations to our investment team. I was also in charge of building the workflow automation tools for brand managers.

Delivered a performance-based advertising keyword recommendation system.
